benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/tags - Add tags to account

covered: Valid Payload scenarios (TC01, TC02, TC04, TC18, TC24) demonstrate successful creation with valid payloads and returned Tag objects.
Invalid Payload scenarios (TC07, TC08, TC09, TC11, TC12, TC13, TC14, TC17, TC22, TC23) cover malformed input, missing fields, and invalid IDs.
Duplicate Submission scenarios (TC05, TC19, TC21) test idempotence and deduplication.
Large Payloads (TC18) test handling of a payload with 100 tag IDs.
Query Parameters handling (TC06) ensures ignore of limit/offset/sort for POST.
Server Error Handling (TC16) tests 503 when the tag service is unavailable.
Header sanitization (TC22) checks sanitization of header content against injection.
Backward compatibility (TC24) confirms compatibility with API version 1.0.
gaps: Rate Limiting: No tests for throttling or 429 responses under high load.
Caching Behavior: No tests for ETag/Cache-Control headers or cache validation.
403 Forbidden: No explicit test for insufficient privileges leading to 403.
Internal server error variants: No tests for 500 Internal Server Error scenarios beyond 503.
Concurrency/stress: TC21 tests concurrency with 10 clients, but broader stress tests are not present.
recommendations: Add rate-limiting tests (429) to validate throttling under burst load.
Add caching tests to verify ETag/Cache-Control headers and cache behavior.
Add tests for 403 Forbidden when user lacks necessary permissions.
Add tests for 500 Internal Server Error to simulate DB/service failures beyond 503.
Extend concurrency tests with more clients and longer durations to exercise idempotence and race conditions.
